name: RAT CHANNEL
description:
Mister Ufti is a refugee who immigrates into the global realm. Forced by the government system he has to work in the sewers of the worlds capital city and serves as a rat catcher.

A controller is continuously giving him orders on a handset so that the order is followed. During his adventure in the sewers he finds an impossible situation that confronts him with the supernatural.

Soon he recognized that his situation has completely changed.
